Original:
小巨蛋附近走路5分鐘會到

以鳳梨跟烏龍去做搭配
果香味比較重的酒

除了酒水也有餐點的部分
不是只有下酒的小點
還有比較主食類的披薩跟水餃
如果不想單喝酒或是喝酒聊天餓了想飽餐的
也很多選擇

Original:

Original: 舒適氣氛好的酒吧，餐點種類也很多，調酒單是以經典調酒為主，也可以自行和店員點酒探索酒吧的隱藏酒單，飲品的水準也不錯，此外店員非常親切熱情，服務也很好。

Original:
這間店是朋友的口袋名單，週末和朋友一起來探店踩點，不太好找，店家隱身在住宅區之中，進去後裡面安靜而祥和，可以在這邊舒服的和三五好友聊天，給人的感覺很像一片淨土。

老闆非常用心，幾乎能隨時觀察到客人的需求，當天因為適逢生理期，店家都有幫忙調整冰塊量並提供溫水，是一間非常人性化、也非常注重客人需求的店；店內環境讓人很放鬆，完全不是那種吵雜的酒吧。

調酒每一杯都非常好喝，當天兩人喝了大概五杯，完全無雷，後面點的熱紅酒也好喝，非常適合冬天來上一杯，剛煮好的熱紅酒配上香氣十足的肉桂，很幸福～

餐點我們點了炸雞球，據說都是氣炸居多，吃起來也確實清爽不油膩，可惜沒有薯條，大力建議餐點多提供薯條～

總而言之是一次非常舒心的消費體驗，如果你也想和朋友有個地方可以好好喝酒、聊天，聯絡感情，那一定不能錯過隅意，下次有機會會想回訪：）
EN:
This shop is a list of friends' pockets. Come to visit the store with friends on weekends. It is not easy to find. The store hides in the residential area. After entering, the store is quiet and peaceful inside. You can chat with three or five friends here. It feels like a pure land.

The boss is very attentive and can almost observe the needs of the guests at any time. On the same day, because of the physiological period, the store had the help to adjust the amount of ice cubes and provided warm water. It was a very humane and paying attention to the needs of the guests. People are very relaxed, and it is not the kind of noisy bar at all.

Each cup of bartender is very delicious. The two drank about five glasses that day, completely thunderous, and the hot red wine at the back was also delicious. It was very suitable for a cup of winter in winter. , Very happy ~

We ordered the fried chicken balls for meals. It is said that they are mostly frying, and it is really refreshing and not greasy. Unfortunately, there is no fries, and I strongly recommend that the meals are provided with more fries ~

All in all, a very comfortable consumption experience. If you also want to have a place with friends, you can drink, chat, and contact your feelings, then you must not miss the intention. Next time, you will want to return to visit :)

服務人員態度佳，店內氣氛好，適合約會，價格稍高，整體體驗不錯。

第一次來用餐，點了：
- Encounter 遇見／$350
有葡萄柚香氣的調酒，酸中帶點微微苦韻。
- 烤物拼盤／$450
拼盤含法式鴨胸、真菇鵝肝捲、烤雞翅、生菜沙拉。鴨胸的口感有點像香腸，如果再切薄一點口感會更好。鵝肝捲是拼盤內最出色的。烤雞翅調味有一點鹹。沙拉中規中矩。
- 明太子起司披薩／$280
起司的味道很明顯，明太子分布感覺有一些些不平均，餅皮是薄脆口感，整體還不錯吃，推！
- 焗烤泡菜雞肉／$230
會附上六片烤過的小吐司，可以配著焗烤享用。調味適中，雞肉很嫩，泡菜的味道不會太突出，還吃得到起司的香氣，推！

不知道是不是新年的緣故，結帳時還招待兩杯shots，心情都好了起來😆

The service staff has a good attitude, the atmosphere in the store is good, suitable for dating, the price is slightly higher, and the overall experience is good.

-ENCOUNTER meets / $ 350

-Bak -baked Pack / $ 450
The platter contains French duck breasts, real mushrooms, foie gras, roasted chicken wings, and lettuce salads.The taste of duck breasts is a bit like sausage, and it will be better if it is thinner.The foie gras is the best in the platter.The grilled chicken wings are a little salty.Salads are satisfactory.

Original:
這家日式酒吧是我至今為止最喜歡的地方之一！一進門，你就會被那個充滿日本現代風格特色的內部裝潢吸引。木質家具和暖色調的燈光創造出一個極為舒適和寧靜的環境。

服務員不僅專業，而且非常友善。他們會詳細介紹各種不同的酒款和飲品，讓你能夠根據自己的喜好做出最佳選擇。我尤其喜歡他們的洛神花調酒，種類多且都非常優質。

食物方面，我推薦他們的水餃和熔岩蛋糕。新鮮、美味，與酒品完美搭配。

如果你正在尋找一個有品質、有氛圍，並且能提供出色服務的日式酒吧，這家絕對值得一試。我會毫不猶豫地再次光臨，也會推薦給所有尋找高品質日式體驗的朋友！
EN:
This Japanese bar is one of my favorite places so far!As soon as you enter the door, you will be attracted by the interior decoration full of Japanese modern style.Wooden furniture and warm -colored lights create an extremely comfortable and peaceful environment.

The waiter is not only professional, but also very friendly.They will introduce a variety of different wines and drinks in detail so that you can make the best choice according to your preference.I especially like their Luo Shenhua bartending. There are many types and high quality.

In terms of food, I recommend their dumplings and lava cakes.Fresh, delicious, perfectly matched with wine.

If you are looking for a Japanese -style bar with quality, atmosphere, and can provide excellent services, this one is definitely worth trying.I will come again without hesitation, and I will recommend it to all friends who look for high -quality Japanese experience!

Original:
輕鬆、私密的酒吧提供創意飲品和周到、積極主動的團隊。在這裡聊天很容易，因為桌子之間有足夠的空間，而且音量很小。

酒吧裡有一些清淡的食物，但不應該成為參觀的理由：它們都是剛從冷凍狀態重新加熱的。

酒吧後面的團隊是純粹的一流團隊。當我們到達時，我們遇到了傾盆大雨，看起來就像《魔戒》中的女孩。酒保沒有退縮，歡迎我們，並小心翼翼地在浴室裡放了吹風機。
EN:
Easy and private bars provide creative drinks and thoughtful and proactive teams.It is easy to chat here, because there is enough space between the tables, and the volume is small.

There are some light foods in the bar, but they should not be the reason for visiting: they are just heated from the frozen state.

The team behind the bar is a pure first -class team.When we arrived, we encountered heavy rain, looking like a girl in "The Lord of the Rings".The bartender did not shrink, welcome us, and carefully put a hair dryer in the bathroom.

Original: 我們偶然發現了這顆小寶石，很高興我們做到了。這是一個安靜的雨夜，非常適合與約會對像或朋友一起喝一杯冰鎮飲料，聆聽輕柔的法國曲調。工作人員很細心但不打擾。如果我們住在台北，這將是我們當地的酒吧。
EN: We accidentally discovered this little gem, and we were very glad that we did it.This is a quiet rainy night. It is very suitable for drinking a glass of ice drinks with a date or friend to listen to the soft French tune.The staff is very careful but not disturbed.If we live in Taipei, this will be our local bar.
